skills.name: Flame Spirit
skills.description: [SP: 15][CD: 12s] Summons a Flame Fairy that launches fire balls at nearby targets. Each fire ball deals 960 Fire DMG to enemies in a small AOE. The Flame Fairy lasts for 10s. Stores 2 charges.

skills.name: Flame Ring
skills.description: Attacks have a 5.0% chance of activating a flame sword aura around the character, igniting nearby enemies and dealing 188 Fire DMG per 0.5s for 3s.
